title.value: Mycoplasma hyopneumoniae: значение, особенности филогенеза, ПЦР-диагностика
Mycoplasma hyopneumoniae: importance, specifics of phylogeny, PCR-diagnostic

journal.title: Epizootiology, Immunobiology, Pharmacology, Sanitary Science : international scientific and practical journal

person.name: Tyapsha, Yu.I., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breding (Belarus). The S.N. Vyshelesskij Inst. of Experimental Veterinary Medicine

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there was presented the review about the role in pathology of pigs, а structure and phylogenesis of Mycoplasma hyopneumoniae, data on designing own PCR test for detecting. As a result of the study for the first time in the Republic there was created the PCR testing system for Mycoplasma hyopneumoniae diagnostics. For the differentiation of Mycoplasma hyopneumoniae from the other microorganisms there was chosen a target part of the gene which was proved by the comparison of gene nucleotide sequence in the NCBI base with the genome part Mycoplasma hyopneumoniae J 24893-25570 and Mycoplasma hyopneumoniae (strain 232) 27152-27973. The developed primers flanked the part of the strain J 25047-25505, strain (232) 27306-27764. For the evaluation of the efficiency and correction of the specific preventive maintenance it is necessary to study the peculiar features of Mycoplasma hyopneumoniae strains which cycling in swine breeding farms of Belarus.
